algorithm_technique: Sort heroes and monsters by power. Use two pointers to efficiently find defeatable monsters for each hero.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate max coins each hero collects by defeating monsters they are strong enough for.
problem_summary_technical: Sort heroes and monsters. Iterate through sorted heroes, using a pointer to sum coins of defeatable monsters.
time_complexity: O(n log n + m log m)
key_insights: Sorting both heroes and monsters by power is key to an efficient solution.
A two-pointer approach allows us to iterate through heroes and efficiently track the cumulative coins from monsters they can defeat.
The `coins` array needs to be associated with the sorted `monsters` to correctly sum up the coins.
